rukus.text: 93|2|aur shapath hai raatri kee, jab usaka sannaata chha jaaye
93|3|(he nabee!) tere paalanahaar ne tujhe na to chhoda aur ne hee vimukh hua.
93|4|aur nishchay hee aagaamee yug tere lie pratham yug se uttam hai.
93|5|aur tera paalanahaar tujhe itana dega ki too prasann ho jaayega.
93|6|kya usane tujhe anaath paakar sharan nahin dee
93|7|aur tujhe path bhoola hua paaya, to seedha maarg nahin dikhaaya
93|8|aur nirdhan paaya, to dhanee nahin kar diya
93|9|to tum anaath par krodh na karana.
93|11|aur apane paalanahaar ke upakaar ka varnan karana.
